entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C

Humidity: 94 %

Wind: E 17 km/h

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and snow changing to rain near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early in the evening and ending overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
